ui-label: Temperature Flux Due to Rainfall Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water
description: This is defined as "where ice\_free\_sea over sea"; i.e., the total flux (considered here) entering the ice-free portion of the grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  All such heat fluxes are computed based on Celsius scale.
cell-methods: area: time: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
